constraint.SQL: ["tIB_XMXX.XMFL=1 and tIB_XMXX.XMLX in(1,2,3,4,5,8,9,11,12)\r\nand ({0} is null or tIB_XMXX.XMLX = {0})",[{"expression":"XMLX","length":0,"scale":0,"type":0}]]
